Holo v0.2.0 - Enterprise-grade cross-platform AI assistant

- Pure C/C++ implementation, no external dependencies
- Platform Abstraction Layer (PAL) for Windows/Linux/macOS/iOS/Android
- Rich terminal formatting (colors, boxes, tables, progress bars)
- REPL with 13 built-in commands
- HTTP/WebSocket API spec for custom AI backend
- Cross-platform CMake build system

EOF

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Holo AI Inference Engine v0.3.0

- Custom GGUF parser for loading quantized models
- Full transformer forward pass (attention, FFN, RoPE)
- Quantized matrix multiplication (Q8_0, Q4_K, Q6_K)
- AVX2 SIMD optimizations for vector operations
- Chat template support (ChatML, Llama2/3, Gemma, Phi)
- KV cache for autoregressive generation
- SentencePiece token handling
- HTTP server framework foundation
- Windows build script with clean option

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
